name: Mouse Gestures
short_description: Mouse Gestures is an open source (LGPL) pure Java library for recognition and processing mouse gestures. With Mouse Gestures you have a fast way to execute commands without using the keyboard, menus or toolbars. Compatible with JDK1.3, JDK1.4 and JDK1.5.
